overview.en: (energy technology group is a specialized research and development of environmentally friendly products company, the company into the global supply of high performance combustion catalysts, lubricant, natural organic fertilizer and soil conditioner, feed additives, biological tea raw materials such as ceramic, at present, in China, Vietnam, southeast Asia, Europe and other places to start layout, and march to global expansion.The team is all from the local South Korean financial professionals, in-depth technical personnel, senior marketing personnel, with Park Xiliu as THE CEO.Representative of the lineup team is very strong.After years of industry precipitation.Environmental protection combined with blockchain dividends.We are committed to building a financial system for the environmental protection industry
overview.cn: 新明能源科技集团是一家专门研发环保产品的公司， 该公司向全球供应高性能燃烧催化剂， 润滑剂， 有机天然肥料， 土壤改良剂， 饲料添加剂， 生物陶瓷茶等原材料， 目前， 已经在中国， 越南， 东南亚、 欧洲等地开始布局， 并向全球范围内进军拓展。 团队均来自韩国本土的金融职业人员、 深度技术人员， 资深的市场推广人员， 以朴喜洙为CEO.代表的的阵容团队非常的强大.经过多年的行业沉淀.环保事业结合区块链红利.致力于打造环保行业的金融体系.
